page.syntax: New_String as C = word_wrap(C source_string [,N maximum_line_length])

argument.name: New_String
argument.description: The word wrapped version of Old_String. Character

argument.name: source_string
argument.description: A string containing words in standard sentence format. Character

argument.name: maximum_line_length
argument.description: The maximum number of characters to place on a line. Numeric

page.description: Convert a string to length limited lines, wrapping at the last full word.
page.discussion: The WORD_WRAP() function breaks a string into multiple lines of maximum_line_length characters.
page.example: dim s as C s = "bird cow chicken goat tree shrub mouse flower" ? word_wrap(s, 30) = bird cow chicken goat tree shrub mouse flower
